fields_of_interest: Trade, International co-operation and development, Environment, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Transport
eu_initiatives: Maritime transport related issues, such as EU MRV, directive on port reception facilities, joint projects with EMSA, PSC Equasis.
organisation_name: International Association of Dry Cargo Shipowners (Intercargo)
section: IV - Think tanks, research and academic institutions
membership: Intercargo has NGO status at the International Maritime Organization.  Intercargo is a member of the Round Table of International Ship-owner Trade Organisations with Intertanko, BIMCO and the International Chamber of Shipping.
goals__remit: Our main role is to work with our members of bulk carrier shipowners and related services providers, the regulators and other shipping associations to ensure that shipping operates safely, efficiently, environmentally and profitably.
